systems.name: Result Screen System
systems.description: System governing interactions and information display on the result screen of Tank War
systems.mechanics: Displays match statistics including player list, total kills for both teams, individual K/D ratios, and MVP award; includes interactive elements like Collect Rewards button
systems.objectives: Ensure players can read important information and understand component functions
interactions: Pressing 'Collect Rewards' navigates to reward screen
Optional back button press navigates to reward screen
systems.source_note: Document content and tables from multiple image paths

logic_rules.description: When the Collect Rewards button is pressed, players are navigated to the rewards collection screen
